amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that the SCRUB Act will not in any way hinder the safe and legal development and deployment of unmanned aerial systems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 115-20 to ensure that the SCRUB Act will not in any way hinder the safe and legal development and deployment of unmanned aerial systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 234 (Roll no. 107).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Krishnamoorthi.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 234 (Roll no. 107).
